description.@en: Stitching clothes, hat-making and other sundries I can readily take care of.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Tailoring. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Tailoring, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
